meanings.definition: A minute area of illumination on a display screen, one of many from which an image is composed.
meanings.sent1: The computer screen is made up of tiny pixels that create the pictures we see.
meanings.sent2: The camera captures images by recording the colors of individual pixels.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled glitter on my screen, and now the pixels sparkle like stars.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, pixels are the building blocks that form our visual reality.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully adjusted each pixel to bring the portrait to life.

meanings.definition: Any of the minute elements that together constitute a larger structure (as a photograph).
meanings.sent1: Each pixel in the photograph contributes to the overall image.
meanings.sent2: The pixels in the mosaic come together to form a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent3: I pretended to be a detective examining each pixel for clues in the photo.
meanings.sent4: The pixels in the painting were like pieces of a puzzle waiting to be put together.
meanings.sent5: The pixels in the photograph held the memories of that special moment.
